title: 4C Framework-Based Science Learning Design for Self-Regulated Expertise Development

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic learning design concepts and experience utilizing digital devices
context.additional_context: Strengthening competencies in developing science curriculum-centered learning design scenarios

learning_goals: Learners can generate at least one science learning design scenario using the 4C Framework (Consume, Create, Connect, Contribute).
Learners can collaborate with peer teachers in a mobile environment to perform self-regulated professional development activities at least three times.
Learners can diagnose emotional barriers encountered during the learning design process and propose two improvement strategies.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
